Title: Hugs Can Be Deceiving
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Lauren Morelli, Piper Kerman (book), Sian Heder (story editor), Lauren Morelli (story editor), Nick Jones (story editor)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: Piper is challenged by her Soso experience; Morello gets her heart broken; a figure from Taystee's past arrives to disturb the status quo.
